# GitHub Topics for SEO

When setting up this repository on GitHub, add these topics to improve discoverability:

## Primary Topics
- polymarket
- kalshi
- arbitrage
- trading-bot
- prediction-markets
- rust

## Secondary Topics
- polymarket-arbitrage
- kalshi-arbitrage
- cross-platform-trading
- market-making
- sports-betting
- websocket
- async-rust
- trading-algorithms
- financial-engineering
- algorithmic-trading

## Search Terms
These topics will help users find this repository when searching for:
- "kalshi-poly arbitrage bot"
- "poly-poly arbitrage bot"
- "kalshi-kalshi arbitrage bot"
- "polymarket arbitrage bot"
- "polymarket-kalshi arbitrage bot"
- "kalshi arbitrage"
- "prediction market trading bot"
- "cross-platform arbitrage"
